76144.recipeSteps:
cook ground beef on medium until browned lightly
Mix mozzarella and ricotta cheese
Pour Layer of Sauce at the bottom of a 9x15 baking pan
add four pieces of lasagna pasta
add 1/4 of cheese mix on top of pasta
add 1/4 of beef to pasta
repeat steps 3-6 3 more times
Bake for 30 minutes
